subscriptions.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this subscription? The service will stop at the end of the current billing cycle.
subscriptions.cancelSuccess: Subscription cancelled successfully! Service will stop at the end of the current billing cycle.
subscriptions.cancelFailed: Failed to cancel subscription, please try again later

policies: • Service continues until cycle end after cancellation
billingInfo: • Billing history available in orders section

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your account security and password

errors.newPasswordShort: New password must be at least 6 characters

security.failed: Failed to change password, please try again later
security.setPasswordFailed: Failed to set password, please try again later
security.setPasswordDesc: Set a password for your account to enhance security
security.changePasswordDesc: Regularly changing your password can improve account security

requirements.title: Password security requirements:
items: Contains uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers
Avoid using personal information as password

hint.title: Notice:
hint.description: You are currently logged in via third party and have not set an account password. After setting a password, you can log in directly with email and password.

status.emailVerificationDesc: Verified email address for account recovery
status.passwordStrengthDesc: Strong passwords protect your account security
status.loginProtectionDesc: Email notifications for unusual login activity
